markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tengu Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=1321) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 27 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Tengu Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1314)

</column>

---

Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for the weapons from your Tengu Weapon Familiarity.
name: Tengu Weapon Expertise

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 13" pfs="Standard" > Tengu Weapon Expertise Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 27 2.0 Prerequisites Tengu Weapon Familiarity --- Study has made you an expert with tengu weapons. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency for the weapons from your Tengu Weapon Familiarity.
